analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#262-264) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#359-396)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#474-496)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#568-582)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#593-604)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#667-676) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#407-426):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#422-423)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#424-425)

Reentrancy in Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#879-887):
	External calls:
	- weiContributed = deployedPresaleContract.balanceOf(investorAddress) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol)
	- bntyCompensation = Math.min256(weiToBnty(weiContributed),bounty0xToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensPaid (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#699-716) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#712)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#635) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#677-679)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- weiContributed = deployedPresaleContract.balanceOf(investorAddress) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- bntyCompensation = Math.min256(weiToBnty(weiContributed),bounty0xToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(bounty0xToken.transfer(investorAddress,bntyCompensation)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#667-676)
	- /unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#669-676
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xdcf8bb5c9cb9b2846f240d063fe6ea880fda297b.sol#231-233)
